line_1: And He, methinks, is no great Scholar,
line_2: Who can mistake Desire for Choler.

line_1: Shew'd him the gentleman an' scholar;
As blust'ring B—y to a brother scholar,
line_2: And tho' when roughly us'd, he's full of choler,

line_1: He's a pious good Man, and an excellent Scholar,
line_2: And I think it is certain no Harm can befall Her,
